tasks.task_description: Check current git status and verify all new files are tracked
Review git commit best practices from Amazon Builder Context
Stage all changes for the iac-mcp-server package
Create commit with conventional commit message format
Check if workspace branch is synced with remote destination branch
Create code review (CR) using CRUX tool
Verify CR was created successfully and get CR ID

description: Commit and submit iac-mcp-server package to mcp monorepo
context: Git status shows: iac-mcp-server package files already staged, but modifications to README.md, docusaurus files, and iac-mcp-server source files are unstaged. Also need to add new docusaurus/docs/servers/iac-mcp-server.md file.
Reviewed Amazon Builder Context. Key requirements: Conventional Commits format (feat/fix/docs/etc), build before commit, check branch sync, use 'cr' tool for code reviews, never git push.
CORRECTION: This is github.com/awslabs/mcp (external GitHub repo), NOT an internal Amazon repo. Should use GitHub PR workflow, not CRUX CR workflow. Need to revise approach.
